description: This source file defines API endpoints for managing interview texts including save, retrieve, delete, and running an advisor process on interview data. It uses FastAPI and includes route handlers for interacting with interview files stored in OneDrive through the interview_files_repo repository.

methods.name: OperationStatus save_interview_text( patient_id: str = Path(..., description="Patient ID used as filename"), content: str = Body(..., embed=True, description="Full interview text to store"), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to save interview text for a specific patient ID to OneDrive.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] get_interview_text(patient_id: str = Path(..., description="Patient ID (filename without extension)"))
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve interview text for a specific patient ID from OneDrive.

methods.name: OperationStatus delete_interview_text(patient_id: str = Path(..., description="Patient ID (filename without extension)"))
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove interview text files for a specific patient ID from OneDrive.

methods.name: Dict[str,object] run_advisor_on_file( patient_id: str = Path(..., description="Patient ID (filename without extension)"), max_items: int = 3, )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to run an advisory process on the interview text associated with a specific patient ID.

ctags.signature: (patient_id: str = Path(..., description="Patient ID (filename without extension)"))

ctags.signature: (patient_id: str = Path(..., description="Patient ID (filename without extension)"))

ctags.signature: ( patient_id: str = Path(..., description="Patient ID (filename without extension)"), max_items: int = 3, )
